alert.note: Alert for Alger; Delta; Dickinson; Iron; Luce; Marquette; Menominee; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 15 at 9:50PM EST until December 16 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST /MIDNIGHT CST/ THURSDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST /NOON CST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Alger, Luce, Marquette, Delta, Menominee, Southern Schoolcraft, Dickinson, Northern Schoolcraft and Iron Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 1 PM EST /noon CST/ Thursday. For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 1 AM EST /midnight CST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Low visibility in dense fog will lead to hazardous driving conditions.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive. If driving in fog, slow down, use your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Alger; Delta; Dickinson; Iron; Luce; Marquette; Menominee; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft
